subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacities to reduce the impact of disasters, especially climate change related disasters, on vulnerable communities
subproject.description:
1. Preparation of distribution plans targeting most affected individuals/areas based on Joint Rapid Assessment
2. Shelter support to an estimated 3,350 beneficiaries through distribution of up to 46,700 CGI-sheets 
3. Joint field monitoring by the UN System in Bhutan and the Department of Disaster Management
subproject.title: Bhutan Earthquake Support 2011
